General.Name: Suominen Oyj
General.Description: Suominen Oyj manufactures and sells nonwovens as roll goods for wipes and other applications in Finland, the Americas, the rest of Europe, and internationally. It provides baby, household, medical, personal care, and workplace wipes. The company also offers moist toilet tissues; personal care products; and medical products. Suominen Oyj was founded in 1767 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
